hiveArticle.title: Birthday Party Decoration
hiveArticle.body:
On Saturday we have celebrated our daughter's first birthday, it was not a grand birthday party but we have decorated one of our rooms and then invited some of the kids from the neighborhood.  

We have chosen Mettalic Ballon (Gold, Silver, and Black) so that the photos will be bright and beautiful along with that we have got Golden fringe and the matching text for "Happy Birthday".

It turns out to be a great color combination, so if you are planning a birthday party do choose a metallic balloon, your photos will surely be great. 

![IMG_1650.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmaAfgHyFsaKYyxLn1yTpaxfZTDdm2kdBzv5yJLpqjiF8N)

<hr>

![IMG_1655.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmQruGfPHsPzCBYXLSNV3M293XYjBDx51FNDE6iqqBiFjK)

<hr>

![IMG_1654.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmZz6oognAvAQkLAkqnDS2VZpdiZr6kc9DK89nGBKzVkwT)

<hr>
Camera : Canon 200D
